summary: I’m a software developer/teacher with a love of making friendly, intuitive apps. Prior to development I was a professional photojournalist where my love of software, building websites and solving technical problems led me to coding. I enrolled in Epicodus in Portland, OR to learn programming full-time and become a full stack developer.My specialties include fitness apps, which so far include the top-rated Google Play rock climbing exercise app, a step tracker integrated with Google maps and a sugar counter with UPC and search capabilities. All are available on the Google Play Store and so far have been downloaded thousands of times.Check out my portfolio website: www.mikeschen.comOr even better, take a look at my Github account: https://github.com/mikeschenIf you have any questions or just want to chat drop me an email at mikeschenphoto@gmail.com
